Package org.forgerock.openam.services.baseurl

Class BaseURLProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.services.baseurl.BaseURLProvider
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExtensionBaseURLProvider, FixedBaseURLProvider, ForwardedHeaderBaseURLProvider, RequestValuesBaseURLProvider, XForwardedHeadersBaseURLProvider
    public abstract class BaseURLProvider
extends Object
    Provides the base URL for the OpenAM instance. Subclasses may use the HttpServletRequest to deduce the URL, or work it out by some other means.

      • getBaseURL

        protected abstract String getBaseURL​(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        The implementation of getting the base URL without the context path, which will be added if configured.
        Parameters:
        request - The servlet request.
        Returns:
        The base URL.

      • getBaseURL

        protected abstract String getBaseURL​(org.forgerock.json.resource.http.HttpContext context)
        The implementation of getting the base URL without the context path, which will be added if configured.
        Parameters:
        context - The http context.
        Returns:
        The base URL.

      • getRootURL

        public String getRootURL​(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Gets the base URL to use in the response to the request.
        Parameters:
        request - The current request.
        Returns:
        The base URL. This will never end in a / character.

      • getRootURL

        public String getRootURL​(org.forgerock.json.resource.http.HttpContext context)
        Gets the base URL to use in the http context.
        Parameters:
        context - The current http context.
        Returns:
        The base URL. This will never end in a / character.

      • getRealmURL

        public String getRealmURL​(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                          String basePath,
                          Realm realm)
                   throws InvalidBaseUrlException
        Gets the base URL to use in the response to the request.
        Parameters:
        request - The current request.
        basePath - The base path before the relative subrealm path, e.g. /json, /uma, /oauth2, etc.
        realm - The realm the URL should target. Should be an absolute realm path, starting with a /.
        Returns:
        The base URL. This will never end in a / character.
        Throws:
        InvalidBaseUrlException - When the realm is not a subrealm or the same realm as that deduced from the root URL for the base URL provider.

      • getRealmURL

        public String getRealmURL​(org.forgerock.json.resource.http.HttpContext context,
                          String basePath,
                          Realm realm)
                   throws InvalidBaseUrlException
        Gets the base URL to use in the http context.
        Parameters:
        context - The current http context.
        basePath - The base path before the relative subrealm path, e.g. /json, /uma, /oauth2, etc.
        realm - The realm the URL should target. Should be an absolute realm path, starting with a /.
        Returns:
        The base URL. This will never end in a / character.
        Throws:
        InvalidBaseUrlException - When the realm is not a subrealm or the same realm as that deduced from the root URL for the base URL provider.

        public String getContextPath()
        Gets the contextPath.
        Returns:
        The contextPath.
